name: The last chance (Iván Pérez)
description:
I am what people like to call "sneakerhead". This was a small platforms game based on the idea of the frustration that to get some limited sneakers produces. It was an entry for a contest for @empireshop_ig and I got the 3rd place between more than 500 entries so the price was to have the chance of buying them.

All the level and the thematic is constructed around this "getting sneakers" world.
